query: WITH ad AS (SELECT id, jsonb_array_elements_text(association_activity_region_districts) AS district FROM guidestar_processed WHERE association_field_of_activity=':details.field_of_activity'),
ids AS (SELECT distinct(id) AS id FROM guidestar_processed FULL JOIN ad USING (id) WHERE :district)
SELECT association_title AS "שם הארגון", id AS "מספר ארגון", association_yearly_turnover AS "מחזור כספי שנתי",
association_num_of_employees AS "מספר עובדים", association_num_of_volunteers AS "מספר מתנדבים", string_agg(district, ', ') AS "מחוזות פעילות",
association_activity_region AS "ישובי פעילות", association_last_report_year AS "שנת דיווח אחרונה", __last_updated_at AS "תארך בדיקה אחרונה"
FROM guidestar_processed JOIN ids USING (id) JOIN ad USING (id)
